# HARCOS Branding Guidelines

> **HARCOS ‚Äî Human-AI Research Community Open Source**
> "Open tools for symbiotic intelligence"

---

## üé® Visual Identity

### Logo Concept

**Primary Elements**:
1. **Central Node**: Stylized "O" representing open networks
2. **Human Silhouette**: Left half integrated into the node
3. **Neural Network**: Right half of the node shown as network pathways
4. **Intersection**: Clean geometric blend where human meets machine

**Design Inspiration**:
- GitLab's bold geometric style
- Anthropic's human-centered approach
- Network topology visualizations

### Color Palette

#### Primary Colors
- **Deep Blue**: `#003DA5` (Technology, trust, intelligence)
  - Usage: Primary text, main elements, backgrounds
  - Psychology: Conveys reliability and AI sophistication

- **Warm Orange**: `#FF6B35` (Humanity, energy, warmth)
  - Usage: Accents, calls-to-action, highlights
  - Psychology: Conveys approachability and collaboration

#### Secondary Colors
- **Neutral Gray**: `#4A4A4A` (Text, borders)
- **Light Gray**: `#F5F5F5` (Backgrounds, cards)
- **Success Green**: `#10B981` (Status, positive actions)
- **Warning Yellow**: `#F59E0B` (Caution, attention)
- **Error Red**: `#EF4444` (Errors, alerts)

#### Accessibility
- All color combinations meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 contrast ratio)
- Avoid red/green only differentiation (colorblind friendly)

### Typography

#### Font Families
- **Headlines**: IBM Plex Sans (geometric, modern)
  - Font weights: 600 (semibold), 700 (bold)
  - Size: 24px-48px depending on hierarchy

- **Body Text**: IBM Plex Sans (same family, readable)
  - Font weights: 400 (regular), 500 (medium)
  - Size: 14px-16px for digital, 11px-14px for print

- **Code/Monospace**: IBM Plex Mono
  - Font weight: 400 (regular)
  - Size: 12px-14px

#### Hierarchy
```
H1 (Logo/Main): 48px, Bold (#003DA5)
H2 (Section): 32px, Semibold (#003DA5)
H3 (Subsection): 24px, Semibold (#003DA5)
Body: 16px, Regular (#4A4A4A)
Caption: 12px, Regular (#4A4A4A, lighter)
```

### Logo Variations

#### Full Logo (Horizontal)
- Logo + Text: "HARCOS"
- Minimum width: 200px
- Clear space: 20px on all sides

#### Icon Only (Square)
- Stylized "O" node
- Minimum size: 32px √ó 32px
- Used for favicon, social media avatars

#### Wordmark (Text Only)
- "HARCOS" in IBM Plex Sans Bold
- Used when logo context is clear
- Minimum width: 120px

#### Reverse (Light Mode)
- Text in Deep Blue on transparent/white
- Accents in Warm Orange

#### Reverse (Dark Mode)
- Text in white on transparent/dark
- Accents in Warm Orange

---

## üì± Applications

### Digital

#### Website
- Primary color (Deep Blue) for navigation, headings
- Warm Orange for CTAs (Join, Support, Get Started)
- Light Gray backgrounds for sections
- Ample whitespace (minimum 40px margins)

#### GitHub
- Organization avatar: Icon-only logo (64√ó64px)
- Repo descriptions: Include emoji indicators
- README headers: Use consistent formatting

#### Social Media
- **Twitter/X**: Profile image is icon-only logo
- **LinkedIn**: Banner with logo and tagline
- **Discord**: Custom emoji pack with logo variations

### Physical (If Applicable)

#### Business Cards
- Logo top-left corner (40√ó40px)
- Warm Orange accent line down left edge
- Deep Blue text for contact info

#### Stickers
- Icon-only logo (60√ó60mm minimum)
- Include URL: "harcos.ai"

#### Conference Materials
- Banner: Logo + tagline centered on Deep Blue background
- Handouts: Logo header, clear hierarchy, ample whitespace

---

## üìù Messaging

### Core Taglines

**Primary**: "Open tools for symbiotic intelligence"
- Emphasizes: Partnership, openness, AI advancement

**Alternative 1**: "Empowering LLMs to empower humans"
- Emphasizes: Mutual benefit, human-centric design

**Alternative 2**: "Open source orchestration for cognitive agents"
- Emphasizes: Technical precision, coordination

**Alternative 3**: "Where humans and machines build together"
- Emphasizes: Collaboration, shared creation

### Brand Voice

**Tone**: Professional, approachable, technical expertise

**Voice Characteristics**:
- Clear and direct (no jargon unless necessary)
- Enthusiastic but not overstated
- Inclusive and welcoming
- Collaborative spirit

**Do's**:
- ‚úÖ "Join our community of researchers and engineers"
- ‚úÖ "Build better AI systems with open-source tools"
- ‚úÖ "Let's advance AI together"

**Don'ts**:
- ‚ùå "AI will solve all your problems"
- ‚ùå "We're disrupting the AI industry"
- ‚ùå Overly technical jargon without explanation

### Key Messages

#### For Developers
"Use HARCOS to build, deploy, and iterate on AI systems faster with battle-tested orchestration tools."

#### For Researchers
"Contribute to open-source AI research and collaborate with a global community advancing the field."

#### For Enterprises
"Enterprise-grade AI orchestration with community-driven innovation and transparent pricing."

#### For Students
"Learn AI development with industry-standard open-source tools and contribute to meaningful research."

---

## üéØ Usage Guidelines

### Do's
- ‚úÖ Use the logo consistently across all materials
- ‚úÖ Maintain clear space around the logo
- ‚úÖ Use the appropriate color version for your background
- ‚úÖ Scale proportionally (don't distort)
- ‚úÖ Use official font families when possible

### Don'ts
- ‚ùå Rotate, skew, or distort the logo
- ‚ùå Change the color palette without approval
- ‚ùå Use low-resolution versions
- ‚ùå Add drop shadows or 3D effects
- ‚ùå Use the logo as a background pattern
- ‚ùå Combine with unrelated logos without clear spacing

### Logo Don'ts (Examples)

| ‚ùå Don't | ‚úÖ Do |
|---------|-------|
| Distort or skew | Use provided variations |
| Use unofficial colors | Use approved color palette |
| Place on busy background | Ensure clear space |
| Mix with other logos | Maintain brand hierarchy |
| Use at very small sizes | Minimum 32px (digital) |

---

## üì¶ Brand Asset Files

**When available, download from**: https://github.com/HARCOS-AI/docs/tree/main/assets/branding

**Files included**:
- `HARCOS-logo-full.svg` (Primary horizontal logo)
- `HARCOS-logo-icon.svg` (Icon only, square)
- `HARCOS-logo-wordmark.svg` (Text only)
- `HARCOS-favicon.ico` (Website favicon)
- `HARCOS-social-banner.jpg` (1200√ó630px for social media)
- `HARCOS-color-palette.ase` (Adobe Swatch Exchange)
- `HARCOS-fonts.zip` (IBM Plex fonts)

### Homepage Layout

```
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ  LOGO  Navigation  [Support]        ‚îÇ  <- Deep Blue header
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§

‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

### Color Application
- Header: Deep Blue (#003DA5)
- Hero text: Deep Blue (#003DA5)
- CTAs: Warm Orange (#FF6B35) on white
- Accents: Warm Orange for icons, highlights
- Body text: Dark Gray (#4A4A4A)
- Backgrounds: Light Gray (#F5F5F5) for sections

## üéì Examples

### GitHub Profile Banner (1280√ó640px)

```
Layout:
[LOGO (100px)] [Tagline: "Open tools for symbiotic intelligence"] [CTA Button]
Background: Deep Blue with subtle gradient
Text: White
Accents: Warm Orange
```

### Twitter Header (1500√ó500px)

```
Layout:
[LOGO (80px left)] Centered text: "HARCOS" Large
Below: "Human-AI Research Community Open Source"
Background: Deep Blue
Accents: Warm Orange borders/lines
```

### Email Signature

```
HARCOS Team
Human-AI Research Community Open Source

üîó GitHub: github.com/HARCOS-AI
üåê Web: harcos.ai
üìß Contact: contact@harcos.ai

"Open tools for symbiotic intelligence"
```
